name: Carrots in Cream and Mustard Sauce
keywords: carrot, dijon mustard, heavy cream, side dish, vegetarian

recipeInstructions.text: Using a swivel-blade paring knife, peel carrots and trim off the ends. Put carrots in a saucepan and add water to cover. Bring to boil and cook about 7 minutes. Drain.
Heat butter in a saucepan and add onion. Cook, stirring, until wilted. Add carrots and stir. Add cream, salt, pepper, mustard and parsley. Cook, stirring, about 1 minute.
